name: todo-fullstack
description: Full-stack todo application with Node.js API and NextJS frontend

scripts.install-deps: cd api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.test:web: npm run api:setup && concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run api:dev" "npm run test:web:wait"
scripts.test:web:wait: wait-on http://localhost:3001/health && wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cd web && npm run test
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.setup: npm run install-deps && npm run api:setup
scripts.start: concurrently "cd api && npm start" "cd web && npm start"
